website_summaries.verdict: Sure, it costs a bundle, but the Sony Xperia Z2 is everything you should expect from a top-end phone. Its impressive performance rivals the Samsung Galaxy S5 for smartphone top dog, but the Z2's slick glass and metal design trumps the S5's plastic body. If you're looking for both style and substance from a phone, you've come to the right place.
pros: The Sony Xperia Z2 has a glorious screen, tonnes of power, a great camera and a beautiful design
It's waterproof too, so it won't conk out when you drop it in the bath
cons: It's expensive, its regular autofocus adjustments during shooting can spoil videos, and the camera resolution is throttled when using the full automatic mode

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, received it in great time and I love it, would suggest buying a screen protector, it's fairly strong Glas but I didn't find a small scratch on it after a while of use. This phone is fast, beautiful, and the video playback is amazing, also people have complained about the speakers, well I just came from an HTC with a back speaker, and let me say the fact that the speakers are in front are a huge improvement! Also the notification LEDs behind the speaker grill are awesome and will light all different colors according to the notification, yellow for instagram, purple for yahoo, white for messages, And more very cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it. Guess I got a very recent batch ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Guess I got a very recent batch like 24 or something so it had none of the hardware issues people have been talking about. While shooting in 4k with a compromised 32 gb card (3years old) with .314 firmware, it got quite hot after around 4th minute but didn't close or anything on its own. Although it might had had I carried on. Gem of a device which will carry on for 2 days with light usage easily. From my past experience with Sony devices, they age well (better than Samsung and HTC in my opinion.. but then it could be due to my ownership), I hope this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Also the battery rate sucks unless you use the battery power save options
customer_reviews.text: This phone has given me little to no problems for the few months that I had it. But because it's not a popular model, the people at the phone company didn't truly figure out how to transfer my information from my HTC one to the xperia. Weird right? I had to update my phone as soon as I got it, because I wasn't able to play ANY videos. None on youtube, Facebook, or anywhere. So after that was solved I was able to play videos. Also the battery rate sucks unless you use the battery power save options. Other than those issues the phone is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The metal guy

customer_reviews.title: Does not have 4G LTE with AT&T !!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Phone very fast too but if you live in USA it does NOT have 4G LTE with AT&T if someone is on AT&T and you like using 4G or 4G LTE do not buy this phone.. I saw reviews saying it had 4G LTE I wish i had studied into it more and that is the only thing I regret but there is no warranty so I have to just take what I got... but if Internet is not an issue for you but you just want style then this is the phone for you because its amazingly beautiful way more then any Android I've seen yet
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Buy the magnetor
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast it is, the image quality, the size is perfect. I barely use my laptop. But...buy the magnetor with it, I charged the normal way for 2 months and it is no longer waterproof since the lid doesn't not seal anymore, I had to tape it up to keep it closed and buy a magnetor, which at these circumstances should be supplied with the cellphone. Sony didn't reply my complaint which is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela O.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone but sometimes hate it too
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone but sometimes hate it too. It looks amazing. High quality build all around. The problem is the cell signal is poor compared to my nexus 4. It also drops the wireless connection every so often. I have heard that part of the issue is that it is running Android 4.4.2 instead of the latest 4.4.4 which fixes some of the wireless communication issues. You can always switch to the latest cyanogenmod image for the Z2, but you'll lose many awesome Sony software features (camera software, noise cancellation support for the sony earbuds, etc)
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Vey mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera and the video but the slot cover broke off in a month and then the phone charger stopped working with the jack I ended up buying an external phone battery to keep my battery charged. Also my phone will go from speakerphone to private on it's own at the worst possible times. I wanted to love this phone. The screen size is good but I have never had so many bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Yarosz

customer_reviews.title: A Good Puchase!
customer_reviews.text: This phone takes awesome pictures! I don't even need my DSLR in most occasions, and this is exactly why I choose this phone. The phone has also awesome battery, after a whole day heavy use (chatting, checking email, taking pictures, watching couple youtubes), there was still more than 30% left. Most days I have still more than half left by 9pm! I also like the flat square design of the phone. It looks modern and clean lined. It is also waterproof and I tested it... Android KitKat system is good...you know that already...
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Super cell
customer_reviews.text: This "last year's" Sony flagship cell phone is everything I wanted, at a price I could afford, is providing great service, & still surprising me with some of its features. I was a bit concerned about the glass both front & back, but in a couple short drops no damage occurred. Quick delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: A Texan Brit mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: the phone came to me faulty and the store has not given me any solution in this regard, I am very disappointed in this store
customer_reviews.text: I believe I should have warranty when the product is defective, I plunged the phone for the first time in water at a depth of no more than 10 cm and it stopped working instantly. The phone had all their protecion against dust and water !. I am very disappointed and upset about not getting solution on your part I am a very honest person and hope to receive Solution from your part.
customer_reviews.author: luis andrade

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Camera isn't as good as I'm used to. Overheated one night and never came back on. I am currently trying for a manufacturers refund. Still a great phone for the price. I will be upgrading to the model that has a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still using it almost four years after purchase. Drawbacks ...
customer_reviews.text: Still using it almost four years after purchase. Drawbacks are the heating and the consequent result of the back glass always cracking. Changed it thrice now. Turned me off devices with back glass.
customer_reviews.author: Omorogbe Usuomon

customer_reviews.title: as flash light filtered into the lens additionally function to immerse the phone in water not be able to use for making test wit
customer_reviews.text: The phone came defective, pictures taken with low light conditions come with halos or white or blue spots, as flash light filtered into the lens additionally function to immerse the phone in water not be able to use for making test with the pressure sensor indicates to me that the phone does good vacuum seal, I got this just putting the phone in a ziploc bag, which is obviously not good. A very bad experience with this purchase, the same I had when I bought my Nokia n900 years, amazing that at this point still sell so expensive equipment such failures.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto T.

customer_reviews.title: He thinks the hardware is even better than the Iphone
customer_reviews.text: Sony phones are very high quality and this is a testament to that. I got this for my uncle and he has no complaints about the quality of this product. He thinks the hardware is even better than the Iphone, except for the software, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Prakash Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone, it just needs 2 extras!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone, 5 stars, everything i expected it to be, only 2 things. 1. Buy the charging dock or charging dock adapter, i just dont think opening and closing those flaps daily will come with no consecuences (by the end of the day i still have around 30% of the battery left) 2. Even though the phone feels mega solid, and the screen and back feel bullet proof the edges do get scuffs (mayor ones) by minor drops, BUY A CASE aswell, i ordered a really slim one and it gets the job done, with this 2 things it is the perfect phone!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Flores

customer_reviews.title: All around beautiful. Great battery life. Awesome screen. Minimal mfg junk.
customer_reviews.text: Clean and lean. The Android experience on this phone is unequalled by any other. The phone feels solid. The battery life is double that of the Xperia Z or ZL and the customizations atop android by Sony enhance rather than duplicate or add unnecessary junk a la Samsung. One thing I did not like is the tampering of the Google now launcher.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ashbery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone. I liked the design a lot
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone.I liked the design a lot. Especially the magnetic charging socket. No need to open the USB cover to recharge. The battery life is good. I am not a gamer and mainly use the phone for email, photos/videos and navigation. I usually charge the phone once per two days. I am giving 4 stars for the camera overheating problem. Although the camera has outstanding performance it gets hot after shooting 5-7 minutes of video and shuts down. I hope sony will fix this in future updates.
customer_reviews.author: Davit Yeghiazaryan

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, beauty and powerful like no other. Pros: - Best camera ever. - 2+ days of battery life. - Funny apps to make the most out of the camera. - Sony Walkman, Movies, Album and Smart Connect really good apps. - Elegant, elegant, elegant. - The display is something else. Cons : - None, seriously none. Sadly Shopebest didn't include the noise canceling headphone, just a cheap one. I'm so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The phone is amazing, i was waiting for the note 4 but ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing, i was waiting for the note 4 but didnt have enough patience and ended up buying this phone which was an awesome move, i have never had a better phone than this Sony Xperia 2. This definitely out competes the other phones i had like all my Galaxy notes and iphones. I recommend it, do your research online spec and problem wise and youll see only positives, i bought this for the USA and it is more unique here than other phones out!! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pilyugin

customer_reviews.title: non-US plug and Chinese Menu - sold by "FGS Trading"
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, no complains at all. Verified IMEI at imei.info and it reads "Xperia Z2 D6503" so the phone is not fake. My only complain and warning to other buyers is about the seller - the phone turns on in Chinese and dosn't prompt to select a language. likely i had sony xperia before and after 10 minutes playing with menu settings i was able to switch it to English. and 2nd issue is that the phone comes with non-US plug (which Google identified as Hong Kong BS1363 standard) so you WILL need an adapter for 5.0V 1500mAmp.
customer_reviews.author: Keleb the Dog

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed. I bought this phone in September 2014 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I bought this phone in September 2014 and stopped working today . He has not been beaten , I have not submerged in water and now simply not on. When I send for review I was told that no repair because the plate was damaged . Who is responsible for this? it was a new or repaired phone?

customer_reviews.title: Freezing Touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: I recently received this 13 days ago and the touchscreen freezes and is unresponsive. I have to constantly lock and unlock the phone to do things which is very annoying :\ my last phone was a Sony M dual and this has never happened in the 9 month I've had it, I was hoping for a better phone but got this reoccuring issue. If I can get a replacement with no additional costs I can update this post hopefully with a better review.

customer_reviews.title: dont buy, buy Sony z1 instead
customer_reviews.text: works fine but I think it's not the original Sony z2 from the main company. Because it was lagging and the sound in calls is very low. Plus the quality of the phone is kind of bad

customer_reviews.text: My package arrived sealed with a fake Sony label. Inside I found a generic charger of questionable qualify, far below anything Sony would approve of. With many questions lingering what is actually in the package, you are far better off paying a little bit more from a Sony approved seller from who you know everything is the real McCoy.

customer_reviews.title: The performance it's great so far
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel is luxurious. The performance it's great so far. I had an iPhone 4s and I wanted a new, powerful phone and I choose the perfect one for me without paying too much. I was scared of android because I had a horrible experience with a Samsung S3, but I'm falling in love with the Lollipop features with no trauma.

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent phone. Very fast and exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent phone. Very fast and exactly what I thought it would be. The only problem is the call quality, even with the new update. It's just not as clear as other phones, BUT that's not what I want in a phone, surprisingly. I'd say get this phone if you are on the fence about it. Very clear pictures, video, audio, etc. 5/5 P.S. My phone case could have something to do with the call quality as well, but who knows.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning phone from Sony!!!

Though Sony has taken a long time to come up with a competitive flagship smartphone, they have finally got the formula right..Let's see if people get to see it and realize that there are better phones than iphones and samsung galaxys..(nothing against those phones). Pros long battery life, fast, feels like a luxury or say an expensive smartphone, stunning display...list goes on Cons Could not think of any at this time, probably a little bigger in the hand for people who might feel that way (i like it though).

customer_reviews.title: This phone was good at first but after three days of having it ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone was good at first but after three days of having it plunged to less than 10 cm and the camera fogging and then the touchscreen did not work, went crazy and now does not work. I am very disillusioned

customer_reviews.title: Not Made according to specifications
customer_reviews.text: Simply don't buy this product it's not even standard definition
customer_reviews.author: PIYUSH PATEL

customer_reviews.title: The true dark horse in advanced smart phones...
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this phone from Amazon a few days ago and I am pleasantly impressed. It's a very speedy phone, not loaded with bloatware since it is an unsubsidized phone, takes incredible images, has a lengthy battery life, and is waterproof as well. It may not be as feature laden as say a Samsung Galaxy S4 (which this Xperia Z2 replaces), but it doesn't everything well and you won't feel that you are missing out on anything. Even though this is the "international" version, it is compatible on ALL GSM compatible networks, including LTE. It will work with no issues on TMobile and AT&T networks (and all other companies that use these companies' networks). I highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: buy from a real store.
customer_reviews.text: The first phone I received was defective so I sent it back. The replacement seemed fine except the scratches on the sides then I noticed the charging dock doesn't work with it on the magnetic connection. Then i opened the album and their are pictures of guys working on phones and other strange things. Then I felt the back and turned it over and the back glass was not fastened properly and became two pieces quick. I'm sure this is a 5 star phone but not when you're buying new price and received a refurb or jerryrigged device. So beware this is not new and you never know what you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: coty hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice cellphone 95% Z3 ...compare Z2 and Z3 specs and you will see
customer_reviews.text: My best cellphone yet, got the D6503 because it has a wide range of LTE bands to use (translated it means the unlocked, you can virtually compatible with GSM service in any country). Sony android version is nice almost like the plain Google android version of Nexus, just few more apps. Water resistant and a good camera..I think is one of the best cellphones out there and now that the Z3 is out you can get the Z2 cheaper, compare specs and you will see that is 95% same thing that the Z3 why pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente W.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a Great phone! Pros: Support a long list of LTE bands, including band 4 which works in the US! 3,200mAh battery, very long battery life. Waterproof, easy to clean:) Fast CPU, no lag Support SD card Support noise cancellation Support PS4 remote play Good camera Cons: No support of VoLTE Camera can get over heated and shut off in summer easily
customer_reviews.author: shopper 212

customer_reviews.title: I love the phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone: it's fast, stable, great camera, all games run smoothly. But I was dissapointed to see that the camera got some humidity when I submerged the phone underwater for over 5 min twice. I wouldn't go playing too much with this unit its waterproof feature. I have friends with other phones such as the Nexus 5, HTC One M8 and Samsung Galaxy S5 and, believe me, no current phone comes even closer to be as nice as this Sony Xperia Z2.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Bruzual

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Most advanced phone when I bought it. Now z3 is there.... Good sound. Good battery life. Things I do not like - screen capture is tough to accomplish, you have to press power and vol down together... how do you do that ? - Wont charge unless its installed on pc which may be issue if you are in office and not allowed to install. - bloatware from sony.. only a few. - Had trouble with wireless connection to PC via sony's pc connect software, wont work.
customer_reviews.author: dr_rks

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia Z2 Unlocked Cellphone, Black
product_meta.description: The Sony Xperia Z2 will keep going all day thanks to its 3,200mAh battery that'll give you around 20 hours of talk time and over 800 hours of standby. It's also extremely fast with a 2.3GHz quad core Snapdragon 801 processor and the Android 4.4.2 KitKat operating system. There's a stunning Full HD 1080p screen that has a pixel density of 424 pixels per inch.
feature_bullets: This phone does not work with Verizon,Sprint or MetroPCS.
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
